Replace.Text: Baizi's Unmanned Bomber
Unique unit of Abydos School, replaces Jet Bomber, has higher attack power and can launch nuclear bombs
Countermeasure Committee
debt settlement
debt settlement
After completion, the debuff produced by gold coins will be removed, and the unit will gain combat power [ICON_Strength]+5

The characteristic area of ​​Abydos School replaces the municipal square and provides +2 adjacency bonus instead of +1 for adjacent areas. After construction, the characteristic project "debt settlement" can be executed, which consumes a lot of productivity. After completion, the gold coin output DEBUFF will be released. And make all military units combat strength [ICON_Strength]+5.
Chaiguan Ramen Shop

Abydos School has been improved and can be built on grasslands, plains, and desert plains, providing +3 gold coins [ICON_Gold], +2 food [ICON_Food] (don’t ask me why I can open so many stores, just ask for branches)

teacher
The last student council president of Abydos
Always stand at the forefront in critical moments, and all units have +5 combat power when they are on their own territory.
bank robber
Diplomatic Visibility is one level higher than other civilizations encountered, doubles the output of performing raids or coastal sweeps.
sports girl
All units have +1 movement, and each point of unspent movement gives the unit +1 combat strength.
Desert School Abydos

Each desert cell adjacent to the city center provides +2[ICON_Food] food and +1[ICON_Production] production to the city center, and each desert hill cell adjacent to the city center provides +1[ICON_Food] to the city center Food and +2 [ICON_Production] production. All city gold coin [ICON_Gold] output -15%. Every two deserts or every two desert hills will give the standard adjacency bonus to adjacent areas.
desertification crisis
In the inner circle of the city center except the capital, except for forests, rainforests, swamps, lakes and deserts, the food [ICON_Food] output of all plots is -1.
Abydos

Xiaotiaoyou Hoshino, you are the last student (deputy) president of Abydos, the strongest fighting force in Abydos, the God T(?) who interrupts the opposite EX with an EX in the arena, even Even high debts cannot extinguish your love for Abydos, cherish the bond with friends around you, and lead Abydos School to a better tomorrow!

Sand Wolf Baizi, you are one of the thousands of XCWs (?), you are the well-deserved heroine of the Blue Files (confirmed), even if you were robbed of the position of the game icon by Alona, ​​even if the Valentine’s Day plot is extremely perfunctory (Yu Xing Come out and get beaten), there are still many players following you, cherish the bonds with friends around you, and lead Abydos School to a better tomorrow!

Sand Wolf Baizi, you are one of the thousands of XCWs (?), you are the well-deserved heroine of the Blue Files (confirmed), even if you were robbed of the position of the game icon by Alona, ​​even if the Valentine’s Day plot is extremely perfunctory (Yu Xing Come out and get beaten), there are still many players following you, cherish the bonds with friends around you, and lead Abydos School to a better tomorrow!

Gain +{1_num} [ICON_Science] Science from adjacent desert tiles.

Gain +{1_num} [ICON_Gold] gold coins from adjacent desert tiles.
Gain +{1_num} [ICON_Culture] culture from adjacent desert tiles.
Gain +{1_num}[ICON_Production] Production from adjacent desert tiles.
Due to the influence of Kotori Hoshino's characteristics, +5 [ICON_Strength] combat power when fighting in one's own territory
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength after debt repayment
sports girl
Due to the effect of Sand Wolf Baizi (Cycling Clothes) trait, every point of unconsumed movement power gives you a combat power bonus

Bird Tour Hoshino (Little Bird Tour ホシノ) is a character that appears in the mobile game "blue archive". Its identity in the game is a third-year student of Abydos High School, and also a student of Abydos. Si was the last Student Vice President of the Student Union Strategy Committee.

It is necessary to popularize science here. In the world view of the blue file, the student union is the highest authority in a region (school autonomous region), and the student union president is also the highest authority

According to the existing plot speculation, Kotori Hoshino had a deep friendship with the previous president of the Abydos Student Union, and continued to be active during the previous student president's tenure. (one of the Big Three in the academy city of Kivatos) intelligence agencies focus on

But due to unknown reasons, today's Xiaoniaoyou Hoshino seems to be very lazy, and he calls himself an uncle on weekdays, and refuses to succeed the position of student council president (but she still performs the duties of student council president).
Xiaoniaoyou Hoshino's favorite thing on weekdays is sleeping, and his favorite thing is fish

Although Hoshino is very lazy today, she still loves Abydos School in her heart. In the plot, in order to reduce Abydos’ debt burden, she accepted the proposal of the man in black and became a human experiment subject (finally for saved by the teacher)
Because of what happened in the past, Hoshino actually hates the existence of "adults", but the teacher who is the protagonist of the game is an exception

Sand Wolf Shiroko (Sand Wolf シロコ) is a character that appears in the mobile game "blue archive". Its identity in the game is a second-year student at Abydos High School, and also an Abydos A member of the Countermeasures Committee.
Because her dubbing CV is Yui Ogura, players often call it XCW, and her riding clothes form is also called Yui Xiaoche
Bai Zi seemed rather dull in the plot, and even didn’t realize Valentine’s Day on Valentine’s Day (Bai Zi, you can have a snack, others will steal the teacher’s home)
The most prominent feature of Baizi in the plot is robbing a bank (XCW, a Middle Eastern gangster), and riding.
Superhuman talent in sports (referring to cycling around Kivatos in one day)

Sand Wolf Shiroko (Sand Wolf シロコ) is a character that appears in the mobile game "blue archive". Its identity in the game is a second-year student at Abydos High School, and also an Abydos A member of the Countermeasures Committee.
Because her dubbing CV is Yui Ogura, players often call it XCW, and her riding clothes form is also called Yui Xiaoche
Bai Zi seemed rather dull in the plot, and even didn’t realize Valentine’s Day on Valentine’s Day (Bai Zi, you can have a snack, others will steal the teacher’s home)
The most prominent feature of Baizi in the plot is robbing a bank (XCW, a Middle Eastern gangster), and riding.
Abydos High School is a school name that appears in the mobile game "blue archive"
In the worldview of Azure Files, the school is similar to a province, which has its own autonomous region and is governed by the student union, the highest authority of the school.
Abydos School used to be one of the largest schools in the academy city of Kivatos, but later, with the raging natural disasters (desertification), a large loan was owed to control the desert

As a result, the students of Abydos School are gradually losing, and its influence is not as good as before. It even reached the verge of abolishing the school and is about to be annexed by the black-hearted enterprise Caesars.

On the verge of life and death, the five surviving students of Abydos School formed a countermeasure committee to exercise the power of the student union and devote themselves to saving Abydos, which was on the verge of abolishing the school.
With the help of the protagonist teacher in the game, they prevented Caesar PMC's plot to annex Abydos, but they are still in debt
Allah, since it's the teacher's request, I'll accept it, uncle.
I can't accept a hypocritical adult like you, uncle
Violent groups from the surrounding area are threatening Abydos, I hope the teacher will help us
Unexpectedly, an uncle like me would care about it, please give me your advice.
Yeah..? This is also impossible.
Sure enough... from the very beginning, the so-called miracles did not exist.
I think there's no need for a false peace between us (declare war)
Ah, um, thanks, teacher, (yawn), I didn't expect someone to give the uncle a gift or something.
No, you liar.
Here, teacher, take it, as a souvenir of visiting the aquarium together.
......, I don't think we have anything to say between us
Due to the poor text of the original game, I really can't make up a condemnation text, touch (condemn you)
(yawns) Is it long past nap time? This is also impossible.
Let Baizi lead the teacher to our Abydos campus.
Well, that would be great.
In order for us to cooperate better in the future, I said, can the teacher tell me where Xialai's office is (ask the capital)
Teacher...It's different from those adults.
Sure enough, adults are all the same.
Do you want to be an ally, comrade?
..., what are you trying to do with your troops deployed on the border of our school.
Sure enough, miracles don't happen. In the past, so many people gathered in the center of the desert to have a party, was it really just a daydream of the seniors?
You are so kind and sweet.
The choice is yours.
Although Bai Zi doesn't know what it is, it feels good to be cared about (accepting friendship).
no
Violent groups from the surrounding area are threatening Abydos, I hope the teacher will help us
Although Bai Zi didn't know what it was, it felt good to be cared about.

......, I don't think we have anything to say between us
Due to the poor text of the original game, I really can't make up a condemnation text, touch (condemn you)
Ah, teacher, I am Sand Wolf Shirako, a second-year student from Abydos School, please give me your advice.
Eh? Lost in Uptown Abydos? Let me take the teacher to the Abydos campus.
Well, that would be great.
In order for us to cooperate better in the future, I said, can the teacher tell me where Xialai's office is (ask the capital)
